titleStmt.title: Behold Romes monster on his monstrous beast!
titleStmt.author: Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: and are to be sold by William Peake at his shop neere Holborne Conduit, next the Sun Tauerne,

notesStmt.note: In verse; title from first line of verse.
An engraved allegorical plate representing "Romes monster"; with explanatory verses by John Vicars.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop neere Holborne Conduit, next the Sun Tauerne
